#summary Ontology Design Pattern - Statistical Graph
#labels SIO,graph
#sidebar SIOSideBar

A statistical graph ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/statistical-graph sio:statistical-graph]) displays the relationship among numeric data and/or mathematical functions. A graph can be composed of ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/has-proper-part sio:has-proper-part]) of a number of elements including 
  * exactly one plot ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/plot sio:plot])
  * two or more axes ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/axis sio:axis])
  * one or more geometric entities ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/geometric-entities sio:geometric-entities]) such as points ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/point sio:point]), lines ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/statistical-graph-lines sio:statistical-graph-lines]), or bars ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/bar sio:bar])

*Titles*: A title ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/title sio:title]) can be associated for the graph itself ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/primary-graph-title sio:primary-graph-title] or [http://semanticscience.org/resource/secondary-graph-title sio:secondary-graph-title], or to any of axes using the _has attribute_ ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/has-attribute sio:has-attribute]) relation.

*Axes*: An axis ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/axis sio:axis]) can be either a category axis ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/category-axis sio:category-axis]) or a value axis ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/value-axis sio:value-axis]). A graph may designate a primary category axis ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/primary-category-axis sio:primary-category-axis]) and secondary category axis (([http://semanticscience.org/resource/secondary-category-axis sio:secondary-category-axis]). 

*Visual Data*: Since statistical graphs display relationships, we must relate graphical items to what they represent. For instance, a point ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/point sio:point]) that is part of ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/is-part-of sio:is-part-of]) a two-dimensional plot ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/plot sio:plot]) _represents_ ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/represents sio:represents]) an association ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/association sio:association]) _among_ ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/has-member sio:has-member]) two entities ([http://semanticscience.org/resource/entity sio:entity]).
